name: Coloring and drawing for kids
description: Coloring and drawing for kids contains 128 coloring pages for toddlers to enjoy. Drawing app is perfect for girls and boys ages 2 to 8. Painting game helps babies to develop creativity, fine motor skills and hand eye coordination.  Doodle game for kids features:  - 128 coloring pages for toddlers. - Drawing app for kids features 8 themes: animals, princesses, cars, school, musical instruments, food, Halloween and Christmas. - Baby doodle games for kids with simple interface. - 16 coloring pages are available for free.  Age: 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7 year old pre-k, kindergarten and preschool children. Our painting game runs perfectly without Wi-Fi.  There are no ads inside our app. We are always glad to receive your feedback and suggestions.
